features: The dashcam mount Compatible with Byakov, YI 2.7", YI Nightscape, Rexing V1, APEMAN, Roav, Old Shark Dash Cam，Anker dash cam etc. Not compatible Garmin Dash Cam.
Easy to install and remove, no residue.
Wipe the windshield and the bottom of the suction cup with alcohol cotton. Get the most adsorption.
A 360-degree rotating ball adapter head for flexible positioning of the camera.
Come with 9 different joints, suitable for 99% dash cam.
body.description: GENERAL NOTES: Apply the Glue Double-Sided Adhesive Mount Holder Bracket, it is recommended to stick it to the windshield first. It will be stronger when you install the dash cam after 6 hours. Compatible with models: Rexing v1, YI 2.7", YI Nightscape, Crosstour, APEMAN, Roav, Old Shark, E-ACE, TaoTronics, WheelWitness, JEEMAK dash cam and more... (Including but not limited to)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with Yi Nightscape dashcam
reviews.reviewText: Out of the 16 mounts, only one of them works with the Yi Nightscape. At first try I thought none of them worked, but the one in the middle in the picture I attached is the one that will fit in the Yi Nightscape's mount hole. The mount that fit is about the same size and shape as the original Yi Nightscape ball mount.Pros:- 16 different mounts in case you buy a different dashcam in the future.- Suction strength is pretty good. I didn't use the alcohol wipes that came with it, instead I wiped the windshield glass with paper and added a few drops of water to the suction cup before pressing it to the glass.- Comes with 2 suction cups and 2 sticky pads in case you don't want to use the suction. I only used the cups though because of their reusability.Cons:- Plastic bag and the mounts have a strong chemical plastic smell. I had to pour them on the floor and let them air out before touching them.Overall, it's worth the money to be able to move your dashcam around the windshield however you like and not be stuck with the "permanent" mounts that came only with your dashcam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good replacement parts to reconnect your car's dash camera
reviews.reviewText: If your car dash camera connector broke and or the suction fitting has lost its mojo, then this kit maybe just what the doctor ordered. It has a bunch of different fitting mounts to fit as a replacement for various car dash cam designs.I have a good camera but the original mount broke. I could not find the same brand here on Amazon. I ordered this kit and found that came with an equivalent mount to install my window (rear window) can on my SUV. It came with two suction mounts and there is also a tape mount if you prefer that rather than suction.Very pleased. It was easy and inexpensive, it sure beats buying a whole new camera system.FYI - My dash cam on the rear window has a silver colored ring around the lens that faces out towards rear window and cars. The silver reflective surface makes that camera more visible behind the rear tinted windows. This way cars see that you have a camera facing them. I believe it provides me peace of mind with good video and also "informs" other drivers at my rear to "smile, you are on Candid Camera" ( and to please not tailgate, etc).Drive safe and take care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Out of the many pieces I received, only one fit, but the fit wasnt secure. My camera was bouncing around and fell off the mount. Didn't stay steady at all. Disappointed. Returning. Don't waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Utility Kit
reviews.reviewText: I had a dash cam on which the piece that attaches the suction cup to the camera broke. This kit contains a great many options, including the piece I needed. I also replaced the suction cup since the original was not reliably functional. The new one comes with separate pieces that "glue" the cup to the windshield, but still removeable. All this at an affordable price.
